column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Yes it is a chain...but you need to get past that and accept that the food is yummy
column2: the sangria is cheap and strong
column3: and the wait staff is friendly
column5: and not at all pushy despite the fact that they are usually crazy busy.  My favorite dishes are the tomato bread
column7: and baked goat cheese.  I think the food here is more consistent quality than Cafe Iberico
column8: and I would much rather have a reservation than stand around waiting for an hour on a Saturday night.
